item.title: Kotest 4.0 migration guide
item.description: What’s changed in the new version Source: Pexels Intro In the Kotlintest adventures article I described how my team solved different issues faced while implementing test cases in Kotlintest, the testing library for Kotlin. Recently there was a major release of that library. Let’s see what has been changed and what steps to take in order to make use of the newest version of the library.
